Title: Enacts the ceasing repeated and extremely egregious predatory (CREEP) behavior act
Summary: Enacts the "ceasing repeated and extremely egregious predatory (CREEP) behavior act"; provides for the issuance of anti-stalking orders.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to anti-stalking orders
